item.title: Get Current Time in Java
item.description: In this Java core tutorial, we learn how to get current time in milliseconds in a Java program. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Using System.currentTimeMillis() static method CurrentTimeExample.java public class CurrentTimeExample { public static void main(String[] args) { long currentTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); System.out.println(currentTime + " Milliseconds"); } } The output is: 1610032553435 Milliseconds Happy Coding ðŸ˜Š
